subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_01C0_01C9E841.2F873C40
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Yeah-very similar to what I hear. After listening to it for a while, I thin=
k I hear "Find tape record" or "Fine tape recorder."

The interesting thing=
 about that is that the girl with me was using an analog tape recorder that=
 had been malfunctioning periodically during this particular vigil.

Still =
waiting to hear back from her about that.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
=
  From: Frank Ratka 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June 08=
, 2009 1:38 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas





        It sounds li=
ke she's saying "one, two, ....."

        A mistake that a lot of people m=
ake is thinking that there are two different types of energy at work when i=
t comes to sound waves and electromagnetic waves. The only thing that seper=
ates them is frequency and power. Radio waves are radio waves because they =
occupy a certain block of the electromagnietic spectrum. Sound waves exist =
on that same spectrum just farther down with much longer waves. Soundwaves =
and subsonic waves can penetrate almost anything because of their wavelengt=
hs. The shorter the wavelength the more ways we can shield against them.

 =
       Think of microwaves. These are also a type of radio and telemetry tr=
ansmitting wave but the waves also have a physical effect on our environmen=
t by causing molecules to speed up, which creates heat. A little lower than=
 this is IR or infrared it too can cause physical objects to heat up but us=
ually it just causes molecules to rotate in place. All physical things give=
 off IR light. Its a way the total system conserves energy by spontaneously=
 emitting IR radiation.

        Frank R.

        --- On Mon, 6/8/09, Apri=
l Abercrombie <april@...> wrote:


          From:=
 April Abercrombie <april@...>
          Subject: =
Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas [3 Attachments]
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
om
          Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 2:27 PM


          Here is some f=
ood for thought. I am currently reviewing my audio from our May 30th invest=
igation.

          It was me and another girl teammate present in the room=
. I picked up a 3rd female voice on my digital voice recorder that I carry =
with me. We were standing right next to another digital video recorder that=
 I leave beside my night vision camera. That recorder did not pick up this =
3rd voice. I have asked the girl that was with me to check her recording to=
 see if she picked it up.

          I have long felt the true EVP does not=
 come from sound waves in the environment, or then it wouldn't be EVP, but =
a disembodied voice. Somehow EVP's are appearing directly on the recordings=
.

          This instance with the recorders may back that theory up. That=
 other recorder should have picked that voice up if it were sound waves in =
the environment.

          I am attaching the clip of this 3rd voice. The =
file that is named "01-02-17 Clip" is the full clip. You will hear my voice=
 as I say "Yeah", and then another comes in right after that. I think I kno=
w what it says.

          Again, I was live monitoring my audio, but still=
 did not hear this until playback. It isn't clear, so I am not as excited a=
bout it as my one's from the last investigation.


            ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
            From: Frank Ratka 
            To: EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups .com 
            Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 1:09 PM
           =
 Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas


                  I have a running theo=
ry that EVP is carried on an untrasonic wave and demodulated exactly where =
they want it to manifest. It works off the heterodyne principle. If you mix=
 two ultrasonic waves that differ one another in frequency then if you add =
or subtract them together you get a beat frequency or alternate frequency. =
For example, if a ghost is sending a signal at 54KHz and you have an electr=
ic fan in a room creating an untrasonic frequency at 45KHz then you will ha=
ve a intermediate difference frequency at 9KHz, well within human hearing r=
ange (20Hz to 20KHz). This was just an example, but all electronic equipmen=
t generates ultrasonic signals just by turning them on. From this theory I =
always felt that EVP were generated within a few inches of the recorder.

 =
                 We are able to reproduce this affect in not only radio wit=
h superheterodyne systems but also with acoustics and audio as in some pass=
ive sonars and a commercial produce called the "audio spotlight" by Dr. Jos=
eph Pompeii.

                  Frank R.

                  --- On Mon, 6/8=
/09, Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com> wrote:


                    From: Z=
ack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com>
                    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC]=
 New ideas
                    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
               =
     Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 1:56 PM


                    Fascinating!=
 I've had this idea that the EVP are often not recorded by the microphone b=
ut somehow make their way in at the actual point where the storage is made,=
 whether it be analog (tape) or digital. 

                    So much we d=
on't know ...

                    Zack

                     
            =
        On Mon, Jun 8, 2009 at 1:39 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombi=
egh ostresearch. com> wrote:




                      I monitor my audio l=
ive. The funny thing is that even so, those last EVP's I captured I did not=
 hear either in the environment, or on my recording as it happened. I only =
heard them upon playback.

                        ----- Original Message -=
---- 
                        From: Zack Widup 
                        To:=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
                        Sent: Monday, June 08, 2=
009 11:40 AM
                        Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas


   =
                     I am curious if anyone with a microphone wired to a re=
mote site has ever gotten any EVP in real time.

                        I =
took part in an investigation of Ashmore Estates, near Ashmore IL, on Satur=
day night. We had six video cameras set up in the three halls of the buildi=
ng. The video for all was being monitored and recorded at a central locatio=
n. Alas, we did not have microphones at the camera sites conected to the ce=
ntral location. I wonder what we might have heard if we did?

             =
           Zack

                         
                        On Mon, =
Jun 8, 2009 at 12:05 PM, threadsintyme@ juno.com <Threadsintyme@ juno.com> =
wrote:


                        Let's just agree to end this discussion ab=
out her... 
                        Why don't we discuss something on a lig=
hter note? Anyone have any new ideas about either evp or ITC? 
            =
            Al
